ThingDef.label: ancient terminal
ThingDef.description: An ancient computer terminal.

ThingDef.label: ancient enemy terminal
ThingDef.description: An ancient computer terminal.

ThingDef.label: ancient hermetic crate
ThingDef.description: A self-powered hermetically-sealed crate for preserving valuable items. These can preserve their contents for a long time. Sealed shut.

ThingDef.label: ancient security crate
ThingDef.description: A large self-powered hermetically-sealed crate with built-in security alarms. These can preserve their contents for a long time. Sealed shut.

ThingDef.label: ancient comms console
ThingDef.description: An ancient console with an attached communications dish. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient fuel node
ThingDef.description: An ancient, depleted fuel node once used to charge machines with fuel.

ThingDef.label: ancient system rack
ThingDef.description: An ancient rack unit packed with unidentifiable devices. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient equipment blocks
ThingDef.description: A collection of ancient equipment blocks of unknown function. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient machine
ThingDef.description: A large ancient machine case filled with unknown machinery. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient storage cylinder
ThingDef.description: An ancient device that looks like it once stored some kind of fluid. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient bed
ThingDef.description: An old, rotted mattress on a rusty frame.

ThingDef.label: ancient display bank
ThingDef.description: An ancient computer interface. Valuable parts are missing, and everything else is degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient locker bank
ThingDef.description: An ancient, rusted bank of lockers. All of the lockers have been forced open with nothing valuable left behind.

ThingDef.label: ancient crate
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken crate. Any valuables it once contained have degraded to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient military crate
ThingDef.description: An ancient, military-looking crate. It was broken long ago and any valuables it once contained were looted.

ThingDef.label: ancient spacer crate
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken crate. Any valuables it once contained were taken long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient barrel
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken barrel that looks like it once contained waste of some sort. The only thing it contains now is a smear of dried sludge.

ThingDef.label: ancient generator
ThingDef.description: An ancient electrical generator. Its usable parts were smashed or looted long ago, and the rest has rusted into uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient operating table
ThingDef.description: A table once used for surgical operations. It has long since deteriorated into uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient shopping cart
ThingDef.description: An ancient, rusted shopping cart. How exactly it got here is a mystery, but the story is long and probably quite sad.

ThingDef.label: ancient postbox
ThingDef.description: An ancient postbox, smashed and deteriorated to uselessness. It seems to have been moved here long ago for some unknown reason.

ThingDef.label: ancient vending machine
ThingDef.description: An ancient vending machine. It was smashed ages ago and generations of looters have taken every conceivably useful part. How it ended up here is a mystery.

ThingDef.label: ancient air conditioner
ThingDef.description: An ancient air conditioning machine. Its internals were smashed long ago and what wasn't looted has rusted away in the time since.

ThingDef.label: ancient kitchen sink
ThingDef.description: An ancient kitchen sink made of some non-metallic fiber-sheet material. It is badly deteriorated and there's no way to salvage anything from it.\n\nHow it got here must be a long story.

ThingDef.label: ancient stove
ThingDef.description: An ancient stove. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.

ThingDef.label: ancient oven
ThingDef.description: An ancient oven. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.

ThingDef.label: ancient ATM
ThingDef.description: An ancient ATM. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.

ThingDef.label: ancient washing machine
ThingDef.description: An ancient device used for washing textiles. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.

ThingDef.label: ancient hydrant
ThingDef.description: An ancient hydrant. Heavily rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.

ThingDef.label: ancient microwave
ThingDef.description: An ancient device for heating food. Smashed and rusted, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.

ThingDef.label: ancient toilet
ThingDef.description: An ancient toilet. Smashed long ago, it is completely useless now.\n\nHow it got here is hard to say.

ThingDef.label: ancient refrigerator
ThingDef.description: An ancient refrigerator. It was stripped of interesting parts long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient small crate
ThingDef.description: A small, empty crate which was abandoned ages ago. It's too rusted to store anything.

ThingDef.label: ancient long crate
ThingDef.description: A long, empty crate which was abandoned ages ago. It's too rusted to store anything.

ThingDef.label: ancient large crate
ThingDef.description: A large crate which was abandoned ages ago. It's too rusted to store anything.

ThingDef.label: ancient wheel
ThingDef.description: An ancient wheel from some kind of vehicle. The rubber has deteriorated away and the metal is twisted and rusted.

ThingDef.label: ancient giant wheel
ThingDef.description: A giant wheel which came off some large vehicle many ages ago. The rubber has disintegrated away and the metal is twisted and rusted.

ThingDef.label: ancient car
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken car. Everything that isn't rusted away was looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient truck
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken truck. Everything useful either rusted away or was looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient troop carrier
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken troop carrier. Everything that isn't rusted away was looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient car frame
ThingDef.description: An ancient, rusted car frame. The body shell has long since rusted away to nothing.

ThingDef.label: ancient warwalker torso
ThingDef.description: The torso of a mid-scale warwalker which fell here in ancient days. The valuable parts were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient dropship
ThingDef.description: The remains of an ancient dropship. The valuable parts were looted long ago and the rest has deteriorated to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient warwalker claw
ThingDef.description: The assault claw of an ancient mid-scale warwalker. This weapon specialized in tearing through heavy plasteel armor at close range. Its valuable components were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient warwalker leg
ThingDef.description: The shattered leg of a mid-scale warwalker that fell here long ago. It has been picked clean by looters, and no valuable components remain.

ThingDef.label: ancient warsprinter remains
ThingDef.description: The shattered remains of an ancient sub-scale warsprinter. Whatever parts weren't ruined when it was destroyed were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient warspider remains
ThingDef.description: The ruined remains of an ancient mid-scale warspider. It has been picked over many times, and there is nothing valuable left to loot.

ThingDef.label: ancient pipeline section
ThingDef.description: A section from an ancient pipeline. It once carried some valuable fluid over long distances. Now it's been looted and deteriorated to uselessness.

ThingDef.label: ancient warwalker foot
ThingDef.description: A massive foot from an ancient warwalker. It seems to have been torn free from its owner by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined tank
ThingDef.description: The remains of an ancient tank which was destroyed by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient ruined APC
ThingDef.description: The remains of an ancient armored troop carrier which was destroyed by some kind of heavy weapon. All the useful components were looted or deteriorated long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient warwalker shell
ThingDef.description: Most of the armored shell of a warwalker. It appears to have been torn off by some colossal weapon system. All the valuable parts were looted, and the rest is badly deteriorated.

ThingDef.label: ancient jet engine
ThingDef.description: An ancient jet engine, probably detached from a large airplane. Its delicate internals are rusted to uselessness, and the valuable parts were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient dropship engine
ThingDef.description: An ancient dropship engine. It probably came off a military troop carrier. Its delicate internals are rusted to uselessness, and the valuable parts were looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient pod car
ThingDef.description: An ancient pod car once capable of automated flight. Its valuable parts were looted long ago, and the rest is badly deteriorated.

ThingDef.label: ancient tank trap
ThingDef.description: An defensive fortification for stopping vehicles. It's been deteriorating for many years.

ThingDef.label: ancient macro-engine block
ThingDef.description: A large, ancient engine block from some giant vehicle or power source. It's rusted through, and all the useful components are gone. No repair could salvage this.

ThingDef.label: ancient fence
ThingDef.description: An ancient fence made of reinforced concrete posts joined by concrete panels.

ThingDef.label: ancient razor wire
ThingDef.description: A piece of ancient razor wire. It has been deteriorating for many years and no longer poses any danger.

ThingDef.label: ancient pipes
ThingDef.description: A bunch of rusted old pipes. It is hard to say how these ended up here.

ThingDef.label: ancient mega-cannon platform
ThingDef.description: A mounting platform that once held some sort of cannon. It has been broken for many years and every useful component was looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: ancient mega-cannon barrel
ThingDef.description: A barrel from a long-range cannon for artillery or anti-ship use. When it was new, it must have been frighteningly powerful. Now, it's far beyond repair and every useful component has been looted.

ThingDef.label: ancient container
ThingDef.description: A large container from some ancient freight carrying vehicle. It has long since been looted and deteriorated into uselessness.

ThingDef.label: mechanoid detritus
ThingDef.description: The remains of a smashed mechanoid. All the useful components and materials are ruined or missing.

ThingDef.label: ancient mech drop beacon
ThingDef.description: The broken shell of a mech drop beacon. Its useful components are missing and the shell has deteriorated after many years.

ThingDef.label: ancient security turret
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken security turret. The valuable parts have all been looted or smashed.

ThingDef.label: ancient engine block
ThingDef.description: An ancient engine block that is rusted through. No repair could salvage this.

ThingDef.label: ancient nav beacon
ThingDef.description: An ancient, broken ship navigation beacon. Every useful component was looted long ago.

ThingDef.label: hacking
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Hacking". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: hair cutting
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Hair Cutting". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: burnbong smoke
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Burnbong Smoke". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: making skylantern
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Making Skylantern". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: christmas twinkle
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Christmas Tree Twinkle". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: fire smoke
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Fire Smoke". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: sleep accelerator
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Sleep Accelerator Active". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: biosculpter pod
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Biosculpter Pod Operating". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: gauranlen debris
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Gauranlen Debris". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: gauranlen leaves
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Gauranlen Leaves". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.

ThingDef.label: gauranlen leaves, batch
ThingDef.description: This is an effecter prop for "Gauranlen Leaves, Batch". Intrinsically laggy, use in moderation.
